headline.main: VICHY NOW CONTROLS PARLIAMENT PENSIONS; Step Virtually Completes the Abolition of Privileges

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 4 -- In future the pension fund for the benefit of Senators and Deputies will be under State control. This step virtually completes abolition of parliamentary privileges, yet observers believe it is likely to win general support.
